#summary XML Schema
#labels Phase-Design,Schema

= XML Schema =

XML Schema for calendar and tag list. 

=== Schema contains: ===

 * *labels* - contains labels
  * *label* - _name_ - name of the label, key for tag, unique

 * *event* - node for each event in the calendar
  * _id_ - unique number specifying event
  * *since* - starting time of the event
  * *duration* - duration of the event
   * pair since-duration is better than ari since-to, because it allows to use more days events
   * The time interval is specified in the following form "PnYnMnDTnHnMnS" where:
    * P indicates the period (required)
    * nY indicates the number of years
    * nM indicates the number of months
    * nD indicates the number of days
    * T indicates the start of a time section (required if you are going to specify hours, minutes, or seconds)
    * nH indicates the number of hours
    * nM indicates the number of minutes
    * nS indicates the number of seconds
  * *date* - date of begin of the event
  * *title* - title or name of the event
   * _at least one letter is required_
  * *place* - place of event
   * _optional node_
  * *note* - node for some notes about the event
   * _optional node_
  * *tags* - contains event's tags
   * _optional node_
   * *tag* - name of the tag (label)
    * _tagref_ - keyref of the label
    * _if node *labels* occurs, then at least one is required_

 
 
== Schema code: ==
<code>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified">
    <xsd:element name="calendar">
        <xsd:complexType>
            <xsd:sequence>
                <xsd:element name="labels" type="userTypeTag"/>
                <xsd:element name="event" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="userTypeEvent" />
            </xsd:sequence>
        </xsd:complexType>
        <xsd:unique name="eventID">
            <xsd:selector xpath="event"/>
            <xsd:field xpath="@id"/>
        </xsd:unique>
        <xsd:unique name="tag">
            <xsd:selector xpath="labels/tag"/>
            <xsd:field xpath="text"/>
        </xsd:unique>
        <xsd:key name="tagKey">
            <xsd:selector xpath="labels/label" />
            <xsd:field xpath="@name" />
        </xsd:key>
        <xsd:keyref name="tagKeyRef" refer="tagKey">
            <xsd:selector xpath="event/tags/tag"/>
            <xsd:field xpath="@tagref"/>
        </xsd:keyref>
    </xsd:element>

    <xsd:element name="tag" type="xsd:string"/>

    <xsd:complexType name="userTypeEvent">
        <xsd:sequence>
            <xsd:element name="since" type="xsd:time"/>
            <xsd:element name="duration" type="xsd:duration"/>
            <xsd:element name="date" type="xsd:date"/>
            <xsd:element name="title" type="userTypeTitle" />                
            <xsd:element name="place" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/>
            <xsd:element name="note" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/>
            <xsd:element name="tags" minOccurs="0" type="userTypeTags" />
        </xsd:sequence>
        <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:integer" use="required"/>
    </xsd:complexType>

    <xsd:complexType name="userTypeTag">
        <xsd:sequence>
            <xsd:element name="label" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                <xsd:complexType>
                     <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:NCName"  use="required"/>                
                </xsd:complexType>
            </xsd:element>
        </xsd:sequence>
    </xsd:complexType>

    <xsd:simpleType name="userTypeTitle">
        <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string">
            <xsd:minLength value="1" />
        </xsd:restriction>
    </xsd:simpleType>

     <xsd:complexType name="userTypeTags">
        <xsd:sequence>
            <xsd:element name="tag" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded">
                 <xsd:complexType>
                    <xsd:attribute name="tagref" type="xsd:NCName" use="required"/>
                </xsd:complexType>
            </xsd:element>
        </xsd:sequence>
    </xsd:complexType>

</xsd:schema>

</code>
